Imagine yourself in 2024, facing a blank screen, struggling to craft a captivating article. You turn to [your AI assistant](https://affine.pro/blog/10-best-free-ai-virtual-assistants-improve-productivity), hoping for fresh insights, only to find it stuck in 2021, unable to provide the cutting-edge content you seek. This scenario is all too familiar for writers and creators who lean on AI tools like ChatGPT. While powerful, these tools have limitations. They lack real-time updates and voice capabilities. But what if I told you there are superior alternatives available? Tools that not only stay current but also offer advanced features like voice support. In this blog post, we'll delve into the top 10 ChatGPT alternatives for 2024, promising to elevate your writing experience. Prepare to uncover the future of AI writing tools and take your craft to new heights. ![ygMYoXtQW1tEUFkkqwJ7zXJLJtWoAG2joau0hBk6wt8=](https://app.affine.pro/api/workspaces/qf73AF6vzWphbTJdN7KiX/blobs/ygMYoXtQW1tEUFkkqwJ7zXJLJtWoAG2joau0hBk6wt8=) # **What Features to Look for in ChatGPT Alternatives** These ChatGPTalternatives present a variety of standout features that render them worth considering: * **Natural Language Processing (NLP):** The backbone of nearly all AI technologies hinges on natural language processing. By inputting a prompt in everyday language, you elicit a response. However, the efficacy of natural language processing can vary significantly across different AI models. * **Auto-Completion:** The essence of AI lies in expediting and simplifying our tasks. Auto-completion functionalities, where AI assists in completing your code, messages, or lengthy content, serve to accelerate your workflow. * **AI Applications in Project Management:** Various AI systems excel in distinct functions. It's crucial to select an AI tailored to tasks relevant to your domain. For instance, content creators may require generative AI capable of crafting extensive content, generating AI-generated art, and structuring content schedules. * **Plugins:** Integrating plugins enables you to harmonize your AI tool with existing applications. This integration facilitates a seamless workflow, and certain plugins extend the capabilities of AI-powered tools to undertake additional tasks. These features render these alternatives viable choices and potentially superior selections depending on your specific needs and preferences. # **10 Best ChatGPT Alternatives to Boost Your Productivity** Now that you know what you’re looking for, it’s time to find you the best ChatGPT alternative out there. [Perplexity AI](https://www.perplexity.ai/)** ![ER_icREzVYhCjUwrl_BYvz4xmsbT6v6yQ-r5u3929ag=](https://app.affine.pro/api/workspaces/qf73AF6vzWphbTJdN7KiX/blobs/ER_icREzVYhCjUwrl_BYvz4xmsbT6v6yQ-r5u3929ag=) Perplexity AI leverages cutting-edge ChatGPT and various other language models to provide articulate responses to your queries. Designed as an AI-powered search engine, Perplexity AI offers real-time data-driven answers. Notably, the software consistently attributes the source of information, a feature particularly beneficial for researchers and academics. Additionally, users have the flexibility to supplement their queries with attachments, enabling this ChatGPT alternative to analyze PDFs or offer more comprehensive insights. However, Perplexity AI does have its drawbacks. Primarily, it lags behind ChatGPT in response generation speed. Furthermore, its language support is currently limited to English, posing a constraint for non-English speakers. **Key Features:** * Gives answers based on the newest information. * It always labels the source of information. * Summarizes complicated answers automatically. #### **3. [Claude 2](https://www.anthropic.com/news/claude-2)** ![U8VCZwCahpeeMMIjLFAv047PBpjkqD-ZAcIYbcVT5cc=](https://app.affine.pro/api/workspaces/qf73AF6vzWphbTJdN7KiX/blobs/U8VCZwCahpeeMMIjLFAv047PBpjkqD-ZAcIYbcVT5cc=) Claude 2 is a large language model similar to ChatGPT. Trained on massive data, it is built to have fluid conversations with special attention to data safety. Currently, it is only available in the US and UK, and supports widespread languages like English, Spanish, Portuguese, French, and others. Compared to ChatGPT, Claude 2 is better at create resume and compose cover letter. Also, you can upload a document and let it come up with some insights. However, Claude 2 can’t interpret or create images. **Key Features:** * Generate pretty creative content. * Emphasize data safety. * Improved coding and data analysis ability. #### **4. [HuggingChat](https://huggingface.co/chat/)** ![qWp72Y-Wr4bpFCmip27rr2E6d5SUNTu42tXJv93_AGY=](https://app.affine.pro/api/workspaces/qf73AF6vzWphbTJdN7KiX/blobs/qWp72Y-Wr4bpFCmip27rr2E6d5SUNTu42tXJv93_AGY=) HuggingChat is a great competitor of ChatGPT. It can perform the same functions as ChatGPT as a writing assistant, technical supporter, and search tool. The best thing about HuggingChat is you can access it for free. However, you may not be satisfied with its answers. When used to summarize an article. HuggingChat may miss some details. Moreover, it is prone to hallucinations and responds with information that’s not based on reality. **Key Features:** * Free access for everyone. * Works fine as a writing assistant and search tool. * Easy interface to catch up with. #### **5. [Microsoft Bing](https://www.bing.com/)** ![o9BYodgWqsL5KTThcCXVuH_wLLxDwg_75LWDi1TSXLo=](https://app.affine.pro/api/workspaces/qf73AF6vzWphbTJdN7KiX/blobs/o9BYodgWqsL5KTThcCXVuH_wLLxDwg_75LWDi1TSXLo=) Microsoft Bing is on the sidebar of Edge, always ready to answer all your complex questions with information online or perform tasks according to your queries like grouping my tabs related to news. Microsoft Bing is greater at finding facts and any information about recent times than any other ChatGPT alternatives on this list. However, you are capped at 2000 character input limits. **Key Features:** * Answer your questions based on the latest information. * Perform tasks based on your queries. * No need to switch between tabs. #### **6. [Jasper AI](http://jasper.com/)** ![5bnlHzsTW0NefPuJf4p_KOyrV1aEWNZe7UWNQ6ak_fo=](https://app.affine.pro/api/workspaces/qf73AF6vzWphbTJdN7KiX/blobs/5bnlHzsTW0NefPuJf4p_KOyrV1aEWNZe7UWNQ6ak_fo=) Jasper AI is a software that uses ChatGPT 3.5 to finish any writing tasks. As one of the best ChatGPT alternatives, Jasper AI provides a better business content creation experience by offering templates. The more you use it, the more likely it can generate 100% satisfying results. What’s more, it understands how people hate plagiarism. A free plagiarism that is always by your side. **Key Features:** * Generate excellent content for business uses. * Provide a plagiarism checker. * Generating multiple content at the same time. #### **7. [Pi AI](https://pi.ai/talk)** ![9XqmFmFjrZN-C-ezXqNzCC8t_mQGobvEIZ2DPWRBEXg=](https://app.affine.pro/api/workspaces/qf73AF6vzWphbTJdN7KiX/blobs/9XqmFmFjrZN-C-ezXqNzCC8t_mQGobvEIZ2DPWRBEXg=) Pi AI is a personal AI assistant that sticks to what you know. As you chat, share files, and store information with Pi AI, you build a unique database. Whenever you ask a question, Pi AI replies based on the information you shared previously. It can even mimic your tones and styles like pet phrases, or using your favorite emojis. In a word, ChatGPT only has short-term memory but provides more accurate information based on the data it was trained on. Pi AI, however, is designed for long-term information storage and always keeps track of the information you provide. **Key Features:** * Multiple-platform support. * Remember all the information you previously shared. * It can even mimic your tone and style. #### **8. [Poe AI](https://poe.com/login)** ![H2SV9_RxoNux6Z__QESta_2t2gin8aDSCuObERtRGC4=](https://app.affine.pro/api/workspaces/qf73AF6vzWphbTJdN7KiX/blobs/H2SV9_RxoNux6Z__QESta_2t2gin8aDSCuObERtRGC4=) Poe AI, an abbreviation for Platform for Open Exploration, was released by Quora. Different from ChatGPT which answers your questions based on a data library, Poe AI is a tool that helps you search for answers from multiple AI-powered chatbots including ChatGPT, GPT 4, Dragonfly, Claude, and Claude+ at the same time. Poe AI has less potential for integration with other products. Furthermore, it can’t become more defined through interaction with users. **Key Features:** * Allow users to interact with different chatbots at the same time. * Easy and clear interface to get started easily. * Wikipedia-style links below the answer to access more interesting information. #### **9. [YouChat](https://web.youchat.com/)** ![HjTJ1-d3cr0pMYoDHnwCR66pwiJ6YkvPW8VKe6XN8Pk=](https://app.affine.pro/api/workspaces/qf73AF6vzWphbTJdN7KiX/blobs/HjTJ1-d3cr0pMYoDHnwCR66pwiJ6YkvPW8VKe6XN8Pk=) YouChat is another AI-powered search engine that provides informative answers based on up-to-date data. It can also cite current events and sources when prompted. People prefer YouChat over ChatGPT for the following reasons. First, YouChat responds quicker than ChatGPT because fewer people are using it. On the other hand, YouChat answers questions based on real-time data. Yet, ChatGPT excels YouChat in terms of accuracy, and the ability to catch up with the above prompts. **Key Features:** * Answer your question based on up-to-date data. * Faster response than ChatGPT. * Able to cite sources while answering your question. #### **10. [Google Bard](http://google.com)** ![DdgAJtSpsZh2SmIF0y3zHLiYkb2RDhaqj2-ndXncPeA=](https://app.affine.pro/api/workspaces/qf73AF6vzWphbTJdN7KiX/blobs/DdgAJtSpsZh2SmIF0y3zHLiYkb2RDhaqj2-ndXncPeA=) Google Bard is Google’s response to ChatGPT. In terms of working as an AI chatbot, it has access to real-time information. Besides, Google Bard is trained in conversational data, which makes it more chatty than ChatGPT. Most people accuse of hallucination, Google Bard still competes with ChatGPT in the following respects. Firstly, it can pull up information from Gmail, Google Docs, Google Maps, and more to generate personalized plans with your data. Secondly, Google Bard reviews the response and evaluates if there is similar content across the web, helping you get more insights into the answer. **Key Features:** * Generate fast answers based on real-time information. * Pull up information from Gmail, Google Docs, etc. to generate personalized answers. * One-click to similar content across the web. # **Which is the best ChatGPT Alternative?** We have curated a list of 10 ChatGPT alternatives, each offering a diverse array of features.
